member.name: T:DomainModel.Models.Auction
member.summary: Class that represents an auction.

member.name: P:DomainModel.Models.Auction.Id
member.summary: Gets or sets the id for this auction.

member.name: P:DomainModel.Models.Auction.StartDate
member.summary: Gets or sets the start date of the auction.

member.name: P:DomainModel.Models.Auction.EndDate
member.summary: Gets or sets the end date of this auction. No more bids can be placed after this date and the auction is finalized.

member.name: P:DomainModel.Models.Auction.DateCreated
member.summary: Gets or sets the date when this auction was created.

member.name: P:DomainModel.Models.Auction.Product
member.summary: Gets or sets the product that is auctioned in this auction.

member.name: P:DomainModel.Models.Auction.ProductId
member.summary: Gets or sets the id of the product that is auctioned in this auction.

member.name: P:DomainModel.Models.Auction.ClosedByOwner
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether this auction was closed by the owner.

member.name: P:DomainModel.Models.Auction.UserId
member.summary: Gets or sets the Id of the user that started the auction.

member.name: P:DomainModel.Models.Auction.StartPrice
member.summary: Gets or sets the start price of the auction.

member.name: P:DomainModel.Models.Auction.Closed
member.summary: Gets a value indicating whether if the auction is either closed by the owner or the end date is passed.

member.summary: Gets or sets the auctionId that the bid was placed in.

member.name: P:DomainModel.Models.Bid.DateAdded
member.summary: Gets or sets the date when the bid was added. Default is current datetime.

member.name: P:DomainModel.Models.Bid.BidValue
member.summary: Gets or sets the bid value and currency for this bid.
